ConferenceSlide 1 of 3

Altar Experience Conference 2025

Theme: The Original Mandate · Oct 24–26 · Edmonton

A weekend of encounter, revival, and restoration in God's presence. Focused messages on renewal, surrender, and walking in Kingdom identity.

  • Prophetic Ministry
  • Extended Worship
  • Regional Leaders
  • Personal Renewal
  • Unity & Commission
  • Kingdom Identity
Why come? Step away from routine, rekindle first love, receive fresh impartation and return strengthened for the mandate ahead.
Register Now

Bring family & friends. Expect transformation in God's presence.

Prayer FocusSlide 3 of 3

Weekly Prayer Focus

Join the house in united agreement

We are setting aside this week to pray intentionally for renewal in hearts, bold witness in our city, and healing for those battling illness.

Focus your agreement on these themes—set a reminder, gather with someone, and lean into listening prayer.

  • Renewed First Love
  • Families Strengthened
  • Healing & Wholeness
  • Salvations & Baptism
  • City Awakening
Weekly Prayer GatheringsFridays · 7:00 AM & 7:00 PM

Plan Your Visit

We know visiting a church for the first time can feel uncertain. We’ve made it simple. Let us know you’re coming and our team will greet you, help your family check in, and answer any questions.
